duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide world class customer service and promote the benefits of becoming a CLUB Member.
Support compliance programs and demonstrate products to customers.
Execute account servicing processes and regulatory compliance.
Proactively greet and promote CLUB membership to customers.
Maintain accurate CLUB inventory and cleanliness of the CLUB Booth.
Process payments, answer account questions, and provide daily feedback and reports.
Provide peer coaching, recognition, and support as a CLUB representative.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or equivalent experience
